a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Carbon dioxide emissions are higher in richer countries …
Unit 20 'Capstone: Economics of the environment’ Section 20.10 'Policy choices matter' in The CORE
Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/20102550 [Figure 20.25a]
Data source: The World Bank (2018), Maddison Project Database (2018)
Note: See the second part of the graph on: https://tinyco.re/3979725. CO2 emissions are displayed on the 'MAP' tab. CC-BY-ND-NC
